title: Oath for a Foxqueen
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=What does it mean to be a hero of an empire?
]]
=====

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

I watch the gods come and descend
it's clear to me
that we're truly free
from that húlijīng

The dynasty has now changed hands
I'm so relieved
relieved to just be free from that foxqueen

I saved all of Zhōngguó
we saved all of Zhōngguó
The land we love is truly safe from Daji

Long live the Zhōu soldiers
glory to Zhōu soldiers
it's time to spread the gods
invest the world with gods

Soon the sunrise
and the roar of dragons
will herald in that we have the Mandate

------

I saw the gods come and arrest
now it's clear to me
that we're not truly free
far from it, it would seem

Fox's yoke was cast away
I can't deny
but new masters arrived
this peace was built on lies

Forgive the demon queen
forgive the húlijīng
take back my victories
I just can't understand

The Chan had lied to me
must we truly kill Daji?
Am I to let this stand?
This can't be who I am

Lies again
and again
and again

I will give you my whole life
kill me instead

I have much to give
I've much yet to get
Use my treasure hoard for Daji's safe release
Stop punishing her for your needs

She did what you had asked
I did what you had asked
how much more can you ask?

You damn fools asked for unity, and that's what she gave you
How could she know that you would turn her to a scapegoat?
------

No more
That's enough
I'm done playing the role of being a pawn to all the gods

Hero
I will defy all
your injustice
for a better world

I stand
defiant in death, this is who I am
You do not own my life
You can not own my life
I will die saving her with my life

Hero
can't call myself that if I don't save her
though she's just one soul

Though I
am only an old man, I still have my free will
You do not own her life
You can not own her life
I will die saving her with my life
